entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 80
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
